questions.text: What are the first words in 'Tommy Boy'?
questions.correct: Tommy, you're going to be late for school again
questions.explanation:
Tommy, you're going to be late for school again.

	His mother said that from the house while he was in his tree-house.

questions.text: What are the last words of 'Tommy Boy'?
questions.explanation:
That's gonna  leave a mark.

	He is in his sailboat asking his dad for a little wind, he gets it but the sail hits him in the head.

questions.text: When Richard and Tommy were on the plane, what is the time limit in the bathroom?
questions.explanation:
Half an hour.

	'Ma'am there's a half hour time limit'.

Chicago.

	Tommy and Richard had just ran out into a field trying to fool cops, when Tommy saw the billboard for Zalinsky Factory in Chicago.

questions.text: 'Did you eat a lot of ____________ when you were a kid?'
questions.explanation:
paint chips.

	"Yes sounds good, by the way, did you eat a lot of paint chips when you were a kid?"

questions.text: 'Did you live under ________________ as a kid?'
questions.explanation:
power lines & hydro lines.

	Zalinsky said this to Tommy after he used a watch and road flares to make a fake bomb.

questions.text: Which of the following things never happened to Richard's car?
questions.explanation:
Wheel fell off.

	The door and hood fell off because of Tommy, and a deer broke Richard's rear view mirror.

questions.text: What is the name of the man who says Tommy is one apple that fell way off the tree?
questions.explanation:
R.T.

	"Are you kidding, we're all screwed! That kid's one apple that fell right off the tree."

questions.text: Who does Tommy think the skinny dipper at the hotel goes out with?
questions.explanation:
Yankees.

	"Hey that's a pretty girl down there, I wonder if she goes out with one of the Yankees."

questions.text: What name did Tommy call John Hancock?
questions.explanation:
Herbie Hancock.

	"John Hancock, it's Herbie Hancock, duh!"
